trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services

trans-unit.source: Using the different offerings from <token>azure_1</token>, users can create applications that run on the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Using the different offerings from <token>azure_1</token>, users can create applications that run on the cloud.

trans-unit.source: These applications operate in their own ‘space’ on the cloud but at the same time need to interact with other on-premises or cloud applications.
trans-unit.target: These applications operate in their own ‘space’ on the cloud but at the same time need to interact with other on-premises or cloud applications.

trans-unit.source: As a result, there is a need to bridge the message and transport protocol mismatch between these disparate applications.
trans-unit.target: As a result, there is a need to bridge the message and transport protocol mismatch between these disparate applications.

trans-unit.source: Bridging these mismatches is the realm of integration.
trans-unit.target: Bridging these mismatches is the realm of integration.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> provides integration capabilities for the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Platform</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=219517</linkUri></externalLink> to:
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> provides integration capabilities for the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Platform</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=219517</linkUri></externalLink> to:

trans-unit.source: Extend on-premises applications to the cloud
trans-unit.target: Extend on-premises applications to the cloud

trans-unit.source: Provide rich messaging endpoints on the cloud to process and transform messages
trans-unit.target: Provide rich messaging endpoints on the cloud to process and transform messages

trans-unit.source: Enable business-to-business messaging using EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT
trans-unit.target: Enable business-to-business messaging using EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT

trans-unit.source: Help organizations integrate with disparate applications, both on cloud and on-premises
trans-unit.target: Help organizations integrate with disparate applications, both on cloud and on-premises

trans-unit.source: In other words, <token>af_integration</token> provides common integration capabilities (e.g. bridges, transforms, B2B messaging) on <token>azure_1</token>.
trans-unit.target: In other words, <token>af_integration</token> provides common integration capabilities (e.g. bridges, transforms, B2B messaging) on <token>azure_1</token>.

trans-unit.source: Specifically:
trans-unit.target: Specifically:

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Purpose
trans-unit.target: Purpose

trans-unit.source: Azure <token>af_integration</token> Offering
trans-unit.target: Azure <token>af_integration</token> Offering

trans-unit.source: Enterprise Application Integration (EAI)
trans-unit.target: Enterprise Application Integration (EAI)

trans-unit.source: Enterprise Application Integration can be further divided into two broad components:
trans-unit.target: Enterprise Application Integration can be further divided into two broad components:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Bridging message-related mismatch in different sources and formats</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Bridging message-related mismatch in different sources and formats</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: This kind of integration bridges mismatches between message transport protocols, message structures, and message formats between two disparate systems.
trans-unit.target: This kind of integration bridges mismatches between message transport protocols, message structures, and message formats between two disparate systems.

trans-unit.source: This may also include message validation, message transformation, and subsequent routing to other systems.
trans-unit.target: This may also include message validation, message transformation, and subsequent routing to other systems.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Integrating different Line-of-Business (LOB) applications</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Integrating different Line-of-Business (LOB) applications</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: This integrates business processes and applications that span different LOB applications, such as SAP and SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: This integrates business processes and applications that span different LOB applications, such as SAP and SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> enables you to configure rich messaging endpoints on <token>azure_1</token> to validate and transform messages in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> enables you to configure rich messaging endpoints on <token>azure_1</token> to validate and transform messages in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a920966f-2095-4579-9164-da742f7f3353" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rich Messaging Endpoints</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="a920966f-2095-4579-9164-da742f7f3353" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Rich Messaging Endpoints</link>.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> enables you to extend operations on LOB applications as <token>sb2</token> endpoints on the cloud, thus extending the reach of the LOB applications to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> enables you to extend operations on LOB applications as <token>sb2</token> endpoints on the cloud, thus extending the reach of the LOB applications to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: You can then use these endpoints to integrate with other applications, either running on premises or on the cloud.
trans-unit.target: You can then use these endpoints to integrate with other applications, either running on premises or on the cloud.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="c4263b70-bd4d-42b1-9d0b-619afdfaf8cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Connect</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="c4263b70-bd4d-42b1-9d0b-619afdfaf8cd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Connect</link>.

trans-unit.source: Electronic Data Interchange (EDI)
trans-unit.target: Electronic Data Interchange (EDI)

trans-unit.source: Integrating commerce transactions between businesses over industry or vertical-specific standards, such as X12, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Integrating commerce transactions between businesses over industry or vertical-specific standards, such as X12, and so on.

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration</token> provides a <token>tpm_portal</token> on the cloud that enables you to manage your EDI message transactions with trading partners.
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration</token> provides a <token>tpm_portal</token> on the cloud that enables you to manage your EDI message transactions with trading partners.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="ceb9d0b1-3dfe-4979-b9c2-99a353ae98b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Business to Business Messaging</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="ceb9d0b1-3dfe-4979-b9c2-99a353ae98b5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Business to Business Messaging</link>.

trans-unit.source: This section provides details on how each of these integration requirements is addressed by <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: This section provides details on how each of these integration requirements is addressed by <token>af_integration</token>.
